A controller account should not be set t: A controller account should not be set to manage multiple stashes. The selected controller is already controlling {{stashId}}
A controller account should not map to a: A controller account should not map to another stash. This selected controller is a stash, controlled by {{bondedId}}
All rewards will go towards the selected: All rewards will go towards the selected output destination when a payout is made.
All the listed guardians and all their n: All the listed guardians and all their nominators will receive their rewards.
Amount to add to the currently bonded fu: Amount to add to the currently bonded funds. This is adjusted using the available funds on the account.
An account that is to receive the reward: An account that is to receive the rewards
Any account can request payout for stake: Any account can request payout for stakers, this is not limited to accounts that will be rewarded.
Browse the Overview and Waiting pages, y: Browse the Overview and Waiting pages, you can get the guardian(candidate)'s APY
Calculated based on current rates,all fi: Calculated based on current rates,all figures are estimates provided for your convenience only, and by no means represent guaranteed returns
Changing the key only takes effect at th: Changing the key only takes effect at the start of the next session. The input here is generates from the author_rotateKeys command
Display overview information for the sel: Display overview information for the selected guardian, including blocks produced.
Distinct stash and controller accounts a: Distinct stash and controller accounts are recommended to ensure fund security. You will be allowed to make the transaction, but take care to not tie up all funds, only use a portion of the available funds during this period.
Does this guardian allow nominations or: Does this guardian allow nominations or is it blocked for all
Filter available candidates based on nam: Filter available candidates based on name, address or short account index.
Filter available nominators based on nam: Filter available nominators based on name, address or short account index.
For fund security, your session key shou: For fund security, your session key should not match your stash key.
Guarantors can be selected manually from: Guarantors can be selected manually from the list of all currently available guardians.
If you have not claimed rewards straight: If you have not claimed rewards straight after the end of the era, the guardian is in the active set and you are seeing no rewards, this would mean that the reward payout transaction was made by another account on your behalf. Always check your favorite explorer to see any historic payouts made to your accounts.
No funds staked yet. Bond funds to valid: No funds staked yet. Bond funds to validate or nominate a guardian
No pending payouts for your stashes: No pending payouts for your stashes
Nominators can be selected manually from: Nominators can be selected manually from the list of all currently available guardians.
Once bonded, it wil need to be unlocked/: Once bonded, it wil need to be unlocked/withdrawn and will be locked for at least the bonding duration.
Once transmitted the new selection will: Once transmitted the new selection will only take effect in 2 eras since the selection criteria for the next era was done at the end of the previous era. Until then, the nominations will show as inactive.
Once transmitted the new selection will only take effect in 2 eras taking the new guardian election cycle into account. Until then, the nominations will show as inactive.
One of your available nomination account: One of your available nomination accounts, keyed by the stash. The transaction will be sent from the controller.
Payouts of rewards for a guardian can be: Payouts of rewards for a guardian can be initiated by any account. This means that as soon as a guardian or nominator requests a payout for an era, all the nominators for that guardian will be rewarded. Each user does not need to claim individually and the suggestion is that guardians should claim rewards for everybody as soon as an era ends.
Retrieving info for the selected eras, t: Retrieving info for the selected eras, this will take some time
Rewards (once paid) can be deposited to: Rewards (once paid) can be deposited to either the stash or controller, with different effects.
Since this transaction deals with fundin: Since this transaction deals with funding, the stash account will be used.
Stash account (do not increase the amoun: Stash account (do not increase the amount at stake)
Stash account (increase the amount at st: Stash account (increase the amount at stake)
The Threshold must be a positive number: The Threshold must be a positive number
The UI puts a limit of 40 payouts at a t: The UI puts a limit of 40 payouts at a time, where each payout is a single guardian for a single era.
The amount of funds to unbond, this is a: The amount of funds to unbond, this is adjusted using the bonded funds on the stash account.
The amount placed at-stake should allow: The amount placed at-stake should allow some free funds for future transactions.
The amount placed at-stake should not be: The amount placed at-stake should not be your full available available amount to allow for transaction fees.
The amount that will be used on a per-gu: The amount that will be used on a per-guardian basis to calculate profits for that guardian.
The bonded amount is less than the curre: The bonded amount is less than the current active minimum nominated amount of {{minNomination}} and depending on the network state, may not be selected to participate
The bonded amount is less than the minim: The bonded amount is less than the minimum bond amount of {{existentialDeposit}}
The bonding duration for any staked fund: The bonding duration for any staked funds. After this period needs to be withdrawn.
The bonding duration for any staked funds. Needs to be unlocked and withdrawn to become available.
The commission is deducted from all rewa: The commission is deducted from all rewards before the remainder is split with nominators.
The controller does not have sufficient: The controller does not have sufficient funds available to cover transaction fees. Ensure that a funded controller is used.
The controller is the account that is be: The controller is the account that is be used to control any nominating or validating actions. I will sign this transaction.
The controller is the account that will: The controller is the account that will be used to control any nominating or validating actions. Should not match another stash or controller.
The destination account for any payments: The destination account for any payments as either a nominator or guardian
The elected guardian list that did not g: The elected guardian list that did not get selected by the Phragmen algorithm for this era. However they may be selected in the future.
The funds will only be available for wit: The funds will only be available for withdrawal after the unbonding period, however will not be part of the staked amount after the next guardian election. You can follow the unlock countdown in the UI.
The guarantee fee (0-100) that should be: The guarantee fee (0-100) that should be applied for the guardian
The guardian can block any new nominatio: The guardian can block any new nominations. By default it is set to allow all nominations.
The guardians selected by the Phragmen a: The guardians selected by the Phragmen algorithm to nominate for this era.
The guardians that are not in the guardi: The guardians that are not in the guardian set because they need more nominations or because they have willingly stop validating. Any nominations made before the next election will also appear here.
The guardians that got slashed and for w: The guardians that got slashed and for which your nomination got auto-chilled. Re-nominating these will make them available to the Phragmen algorithm.
The hex output from author_rotateKeys, a: The hex output from author_rotateKeys, as executed on the guardian node. The keys will show as pending until applied at the start of a new session.
The key type and crypto type to use for: The key type and crypto type to use for this key. Be aware that different keys have different crypto requirements. You should be familiar with the type requirements for the different keys.
The percentage reward (0-100) that shoul: The percentage reward (0-100) that should be applied for the guardian
The seed and derivation path will be sub: The seed and derivation path will be submitted to the guardian node. this is an advanced operation, only to be performed when you are sure of the security and connection risks.
The selected controller tied to this sta: The selected controller tied to this stash. Once set, this account will be able to control the actions performed by the stash account.
The selected guardians to guarantee, eit: The selected guardians to guarantee, either via the "currently best algorithm" or via a manual selection.
The selected guardians to nominate, eith: The selected guardians to nominate, either via the "currently best algorithm" or via a manual selection.
The specified value is too large and doe: The specified value is too large and does not allow funds to pay future transaction fees.
The stash account that is used. This wil: The stash account that is used. This will allow the controller to perform all non-funds related operations on behalf of the account.
The stash and controller pair as linked. This operation will be performed via the controller.
The stash and controller pair, here the: The stash and controller pair, here the controller will be used to send the transaction.
The stash and controller pair. This tran: The stash and controller pair. This transaction, managing preferences, will be sent from the controller.
The stash and controller pair. This transaction, setting the session keys, will be sent from the controller.
The stash that is to be affected. The tr: The stash that is to be affected. The transaction will be sent from the associated controller account.
The total amount of the stash balance th: The total amount of the stash balance that will be at stake in any forthcoming rounds (should be less than the free amount available)
There is currently an ongoing election f: There is currently an ongoing election for new guardian candidates. As such staking operations are not permitted.
These guardians are active but only the: These guardians are active but only the top {{max}} nominators by backing stake will be receiving rewards. The nominating stash is not one of those to be rewarded in the current era.
Think of the stash as your cold wallet a: Think of the stash as your cold wallet and the controller as your hot wallet. Funding operations are controlled by the stash, any other non-funding actions by the controller itself.
This operation will submit the seed via: This operation will submit the seed via an RPC call. Do not perform this operation on a public RPC node, but ensure that the node is local, connected to your guardian and secure.
This pubic key is what will be visible i: This pubic key is what will be visible in your queued keys list. It is generated based on the seed and the crypto used.
To ensure optimal fund security using th: To ensure optimal fund security using the same stash/controller is strongly discouraged, but not forbidden.
Type the amount you want to guarantee. N: Type the amount you want to guarantee. Note that you can select the unit on the right e.g sending 1 milli is equivalent to sending 0.001.
Type the amount you want to transfer. No: Type the amount you want to transfer. Note that you can select the unit on the right e.g sending 1 milli is equivalent to sending 0.001.
Use the account actions to create a new: Use the account actions to create a new guardian/guarantor stash and bond it to participate in staking. Do not send funds directly via a transfer to a guardian.
You should trust your nominations to act: You should trust your nominations to act competently and honest; basing your decision purely on their current profitability could lead to reduced profits or even loss of funds.
Your nomination has not been applied to: Your nomination has not been applied to any guardian in the active set by the election algorithm. This could mean that all your guardians are over-subscribed or that you have less bonded than the lowest nominator elected for each of the guardians.
Your stash account. The transaction will: Your stash account. The transaction will be sent from the associated controller.
filter by name, address or index: filter by name, address or index
the stash account to guarantee with: the stash account to guarantee with
the stash account to nominate with: the stash account to nominate with
